name: Sleep Motion
description: You are a spaceship pilot and you are tasked with handling an alien artifact. The strange-looking object is probably infected with malware AI that can spray out neurotoxin gas that induces sleep paralysis and hallucinations. The object has 30 rhomboid sides that have random slots filled with the hidden AI and you have to put the other parts that are floating around in the 'sphere' to win but beware - if you make a mistake and put a part on top of the AI -> you only get 3 chances, after that, you will surely fall asleep, or even forever.
